structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.catch_line: Vesting of title in museum when no assertion presented after published notice.

text.section: If no written assertion of title has been presented to the museum within six (6) months from the date of the final published notice, title to the property shall vest in the museum free from all claims of the owner and all persons claiming under the owner.
If title to property has vested in a museum pursuant to this section, a person who acquires that property from a museum also acquires good title.

law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 368, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1996.
